message.content: I'm designed to have a limited understanding of emotions, so I don't experience feelings like sadness or happiness. Each time you interact with me, it's a new conversation, and I don't retain any information or emotions from previous conversations. I'm here to help answer your questions and provide information to the best of my ability, so feel free to come back anytime you'd like! How can I assist you today?
